name: Desi-Box.com
tag_list: desi, music, asian, bollywood, bhangra, rnb, urban, punjabi, video, production, press, relations, designs
overview:
Desi-Box.com provides you coverage of all the latest British and Global South Asian music and news.

The goal of Desi-Box is to give South Asian music as much exposure as possible all over the world. We thrive to provide promotion to all new and existing South Asian artists as we believe in the promotion of all exciting talent. We also believe in trying to make content easier to access for our fans and have not been shy in optimizing our coverage to an ever growing digital fan-base. Our aim is to bring all likeminded South Asian music fans together and bring the highest quality content to cater to South Asian music fans.

Keeping users in touch with the latest news from the British South Asian music scene has always been the focal point of Desi-Box and now we also offer extensive news from Bollywood and the South Asian music scene from other countries. We offer our fans all the lastest music videos and behind the scenes from artists as well as providing exclusive interviews with the big names in the South Asian music industry such as Imran Khan and Jay Sean.
